unnormalised: Okay, so someone asked about finding good PG accommodations in Bangalore near Christ University. It reminded me of my own harrowing search back in 2018! I was completely new to the city, and my only guidance was "near Christ University." Which, let me tell you, is NOT enough.

unnormalised: My first mistake was just relying on online ads. I found a place listed as "2BHK flat, Indiranagar, close to Christ." Sounded great, right? Turns out, it was a shared flat, more like a dorm room crammed with 4 people, and Indiranagar was a good 8 km away! The address was vaguely given as "Near CMH Road" but finding the exact building took me ages. The owner only gave the initial address 12/A 10th Cross.

unnormalised: Lesson learned: Verify EVERYTHING. Don't trust vague locations like "Opposite Forum Mall." Demand the full address, like "No. 78, 3rd Main Road, Koramangala 560034" or whatever it actually is. Call ahead, ask for landmarks - "Near the Big Bazaar, behind the bakery." See if you can get the precise GPS coordinates. And for the love of all that is holy, VISIT THE PLACE IN PERSON before you pay any deposit!
